info.title: Zodiac API
info.description:
This app takes in a User given birthdate, and name. Then it internally identifies which of the 12 subgroup Classes it belongs to, as organized by Quad Groups (consisting of the 4 Elemental Values = Water, Fire, Air, Earth). 
.

servers.description: Optional server description, e.g. Main (production) server

get.description: Optional extended description in CommonMark or HTML.

200.description: A JSON array of user names
